extendedIngredients.name: eggplants
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ kg small or medium size eggplants (baingan)

recipes.title: kalimirch baingan, how to make kalimirch baingan | baingan s
recipes.instructions: rinse the eggplants very well in water. chop or dice them and keep them in salted water for 15-20 minutes. if they are very small brinjals… then you could just slit them like we do for stuffed brinjals.in a pan heat oil… when the oil becomes hot… add the chopped brinjals.saute the aubergines for 4-5 minutes on medium flame. now add the turmeric powder and black pepper powder and mix it well with the aubergines.saute the aubergines on a low flame. this is how they looked after 7 minutes.cook them till they become tender. finally season with salt.garnish with coriander leaves and serve kalimirch baingan hot with rotis or bread.

steps.step: rinse the eggplants very well in water. chop or dice them and keep them in salted water for 15-20 minutes. if they are very small brinjals… then you could just slit them like we do for stuffed brinjals.in a pan heat oil… when the oil becomes hot… add the chopped brinjals.saute the aubergines for 4-5 minutes on medium flame. now add the turmeric powder and black pepper powder and mix it well with the aubergines.saute the aubergines on a low flame. this is how they looked after 7 minutes.cook them till they become tender. finally season with salt.garnish with coriander leaves and serve kalimirch baingan hot with rotis or bread.
